Action.author: suryalnvs
Action.body: Started this test by sending a transaction per 5 sec to 1 peer in each org in the community-longrunning lab.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: During v1.4 system testing, we can skip some tests from the regression bucket, including: the v1.3 longrunning tests (3 of them, low volume traffic for a week) and the old v1.3 sidedb performance tests (deprecated and replaced by more tests in v.14).
